Activity: Log in, check emails. Prepare the build for playtesting. Write a brief summary of the integrated systems and core gameplay features for the playtesters.

Email @QTest-1 @LDES-1 @CDEV-1, Subject: Playtesting Session - Feedback Requested. Schedule a playtesting session with the QA tester, lead game designer, and a client developer. Emphasize the importance of providing detailed and constructive feedback.
Distribute the playtesting build and summary to the playtesters.
Observe the playtesting session and take notes on the playtesters' feedback and reactions. Pay attention to any areas where the game feels unbalanced, confusing, or frustrating.
Lunch break. Relax and listen to a podcast.
Gather and analyze the feedback from the playtesting session. Identify the most critical issues and prioritize them for fixing.
Document the feedback and create a list of action items. Assign the action items to the appropriate team members.
Meet with the team to discuss the playtesting feedback and the action items. Brainstorm solutions to the identified issues.
Update the integration plan and the development roadmap based on the playtesting feedback and the action items. Prepare for the next week's tasks.
